name: Tobias Friedrich 0001
content: Algorithm Engineering | Hasso-Plattner-Institut Prof. Dr. Tobias Friedrich Research Group Algorithm Engineering The Research Group of Algorithm Engineering, led by Prof. Tobias Friedrich, deals with the theoretical foundation of computer science. This area involves both the design and the analysis of efficient algorithms and the limits of predictability. The focus of the Research Group is on randomized algorithms, random processes, and heuristic optimization. As the primary subject of research, algorithms are investigated mathematically as well as empirically.
